header.title: Justin Trudeau slammed for new profile picture days after brownface photo
header.postText: Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau has been slammed for changing his profile picture on Twitter to show him talking to a black person, days after being accused of racism for wearing blackface.', 'Mr Trudeau appears to have changed his profile picture within the last few days, meaning the change was made after pictures of him emerged wearing blackface.', 'Old photographs of the Candian prime minister emerged, showing him with a darkened face at an Arabian nights costume party in 2001.', 'Subsequent pictures showed him wearing blackface while performing a version of Harry Belafonte’s ‘Banana Boat Song (Day-O)’ during a talent show at Jean Brebeuf High School in Quebec, which he graduated from in the early 1990s.', 'Global News also broadcast a brief video of Trudeau in ‘brownface’ while raising his hands in the air and sticking out his tongue.', 'In the latest incident, he has been accused of insensitivity after changing his picture.', 'One user wrote: “Some of my best friends are black”, Trudeau now has an avatar of him talking to a black person.', '‘I kind of feel sorry for him. He is just absurd.’', 'Another added: ‘Was it a mistake by @JustinTrudeau to change his profile picture to a shot of him smiling at a black man?', '‘Is it a demonstration that he’s left his racist past behind, or is his use of people of colour as political props evidence that he hasn’t changed very much?’', 'Mr Trudeau has said that he is truly sorry for what he did.', 'He said: ‘I’m going to ask Canadians to forgive me for what I did.', '‘I shouldn’t have done that. I take responsibility for it. It was a dumb thing to do.’
